ShapeEngine
Table of Contents

Class TextureSurface

Namespace
ShapeEngine.Core
Assembly
ShapeEngine.dll

Allows you to create a render texture and draw to its surface. The texture can not be resized after creation and has to be manually unloaded. Multiple functions allow you to draw to the texture (or part of it) to the screen. UseBegin/EndDraw to draw to the texture with any drawing functions.

public class TextureSurface

Constructors

TextureSurface(int, int)

Allows you to create a render texture and draw to its surface. The texture can not be resized after creation and has to be manually unloaded. Multiple functions allow you to draw to the texture (or part of it) to the screen. UseBegin/EndDraw to draw to the texture with any drawing functions.

public TextureSurface(int width, int height)

Parameters

width int

The width of the texture. Must be bigger than 0.

height int

The height of the texture. Must be bigger than 0.
